room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by International Quests Escape Rooms in Philadelphia
review: We had such a great time doing the Diamond Heist room - we were 5 seconds from getting the diamond but that's ok, it was still fun! Our party was 2 adults, 1 teenager and 3 kids 8-10, and everyone was able to contribute.Our game host Jess was fantastic and very accommodating! We can't wait to go back and try another room, and will definitely be back!!
